node.html:
• Extensive experience with Node.js, MongoDB, Express and React having worked on numerous projects that utilize these technologies. comfortable working with both front-end and back-end technologies, deep understanding of how they integrate with each other to create a seamless user experience.
  • Worked on a variety of full stack projects that demonstrate my skills in the MERN stack
  • Comfortable using Git for version control and have experience working with GitHub. I have developed and maintained Git workflows for various projects, ensuring that code is organized, well-documented, and easy to collaborate on.
  • Experience building RESTful APIs and working with databases such as MongoDB. I am proficient in server-side programming with Node.js and have experience implementing server-side logic using frameworks such as Express

• An offline intensive bootcamp progam where domain experts assign and review our code
  • Write modern, performant, maintainable code for internal projects
  • Work with a variety of different languages, platforms, frameworks, and content management systems such as JavaScript, TypeScript, Gatsby, React, Craft, WordPress, Prismic, and Netlify
  • Communicate with multi-disciplinary teams of engineers, designers on a daily basis

• Developed and shipped highly interactive web applications NodeJS, ExpressJS and MongoDB With Server side rendering
  • Integrated payment gateway - Paypal and Razorpay - Otp Verification - Twilio
  • Deployed in AWS EC2 instance with Nginx as reverse proxy and load balancer
  • Advanced Admin side including charts and graph reports to view state of application

frontmatter.title: Kmea college of Arts and Science

node.html:
• Bachelor of Computer Applications (BCA), Mahatma Gandhi University, 2019-2022
  • Worked on a team to develop a web application using Python Django
  • Programming languages: C, C++, Python, Java, Php
  • Data Structures and Algorithms, Programming Fundamentals, Microprocessors Linux, Networking, Adanced statistical methods, Data Mining, Cloud Computing and System analysis and software engineering
